mapper.select: select b.sareaDtlNm ,a.forecast_id ,a.predcYmd ,a.predcNoonSeCd ,a.avgArtmp ,a.avgWspd ,a.avgWtem ,a.avgWvhgt ,a.avgCrsp ,a.weather ,a.totalIndex ,a.sea_id from forecast a join sea b on b.sea_id = a.sea_id where 1=1 and a.del_ny = 0 order by a.sea_id asc, a.predcYmd ASC

select b.sareaDtlNm ,a.forecast_id ,a.predcYmd ,a.predcNoonSeCd ,a.avgArtmp ,a.avgWspd ,a.avgWtem ,a.avgWvhgt ,a.avgCrsp ,a.weather ,a.totalIndex ,a.sea_id from forecast a join sea b on b.sea_id = a.sea_id where 1=1 and a.sea_id = #{sea_id}
mapper.update: update forecast set del_ny = 1 where predcYmd < CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 SECOND
update forecast set del_ny = 1 where 1=1 and forecast_id = #{forecast_id}

select a.sea_id ,a.sareaDtlNm ,a.lat ,a.lot from sea a where sea_id = #{sea_id}
select sea_id AS sea_id ,sareaDtlNm ,lat ,lot from sea where 1=1 AND sea_id = #{sea_id}
